Ready to fly the legendary NAMC YS-11 but don't know where to start? You're in the right place! This is Part 1 of our Famous Flyer 22 series, designed to get you from a quiet cockpit to the runway with confidence. ğŸ˜

In this step-by-step tutorial, we cover the essentials:
âœ¨ Powering up the aircraft from cold and dark
ğŸ§ Locating and using the essential checklists
ğŸšš Calling for ground services (fuel, power, and more!)

ğŸ“·Quick camera views

- shift 1: center cockpit view
- shift 2: throttle levelers
- shift 3: autopilot + trim
- shift 4: exterior lights
- shift 5: DC power
- shift 6: fuel control
- shift 7: CF power 
- shift 8: light dimmers + heater
- shift 9:cabin sign lightning and radio
- shift 0: copilot light dimmers + heater
